mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WL_FORM ( id, column1, column2, column3, column4, column5, column6, column7, column8, column9, column10, column11, column12, column13, column14, column15, column16, column17, column18, column19, column20, column21, column22, column23, column24, column25, column26, column27, column28, column29, column30, column31, column32, column33, column34, column35, column36, column37, column38, column39, column40, column41, column42, column43, column44, column45, column46, column47, column48, column49, column50 ) VALUES ( #{id:NUMERIC}, #{column1:VARCHAR}, #{column2:VARCHAR}, #{column3:VARCHAR}, #{column4:VARCHAR}, #{column5:VARCHAR}, #{column6:VARCHAR}, #{column7:VARCHAR}, #{column8:VARCHAR}, #{column9:VARCHAR}, #{column10:VARCHAR}, #{column11:VARCHAR}, #{column12:VARCHAR}, #{column13:VARCHAR}, #{column14:VARCHAR}, #{column15:VARCHAR}, #{column16:VARCHAR}, #{column17:VARCHAR}, #{column18:VARCHAR}, #{column19:VARCHAR}, #{column20:VARCHAR}, #{column21:VARCHAR}, #{column22:VARCHAR}, #{column23:VARCHAR}, #{column24:VARCHAR}, #{column25:VARCHAR}, #{column26:VARCHAR}, #{column27:VARCHAR}, #{column28:VARCHAR}, #{column29:VARCHAR}, #{column30:VARCHAR}, #{column31:VARCHAR}, #{column32:VARCHAR}, #{column33:VARCHAR}, #{column34:VARCHAR}, #{column35:VARCHAR}, #{column36:VARCHAR}, #{column37:VARCHAR}, #{column38:VARCHAR}, #{column39:VARCHAR}, #{column40:VARCHAR}, #{column41:VARCHAR}, #{column42:VARCHAR}, #{column43:VARCHAR}, #{column44:VARCHAR}, #{column45:VARCHAR}, #{column46:VARCHAR}, #{column47:VARCHAR}, #{column48:VARCHAR}, #{column49:VARCHAR}, #{column50:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE WL_FORM pd SET pd.column1=#{column1:VARCHAR}, pd.column2=#{column2:VARCHAR}, pd.column3=#{column3:VARCHAR}, pd.column4=#{column4:VARCHAR}, pd.column5=#{column5:VARCHAR}, pd.column6=#{column6:VARCHAR}, pd.column7=#{column7:VARCHAR}, pd.column8=#{column8:VARCHAR}, pd.column9=#{column9:VARCHAR}, pd.column10=#{column10:VARCHAR}, pd.column11=#{column11:VARCHAR}, pd.column12=#{column12:VARCHAR}, pd.column13=#{column13:VARCHAR}, pd.column14=#{column14:VARCHAR}, pd.column15=#{column15:VARCHAR}, pd.column16=#{column16:VARCHAR}, pd.column17=#{column17:VARCHAR}, pd.column18=#{column18:VARCHAR}, pd.column19=#{column19:VARCHAR}, pd.column20=#{column20:VARCHAR}, pd.column21=#{column21:VARCHAR}, pd.column22=#{column22:VARCHAR}, pd.column23=#{column23:VARCHAR}, pd.column24=#{column24:VARCHAR}, pd.column25=#{column25:VARCHAR}, pd.column26=#{column26:VARCHAR}, pd.column27=#{column27:VARCHAR}, pd.column28=#{column28:VARCHAR}, pd.column29=#{column29:VARCHAR}, pd.column30=#{column30:VARCHAR}, pd.column31=#{column31:VARCHAR}, pd.column32=#{column32:VARCHAR}, pd.column33=#{column33:VARCHAR}, pd.column34=#{column34:VARCHAR}, pd.column35=#{column35:VARCHAR}, pd.column36=#{column36:VARCHAR}, pd.column37=#{column37:VARCHAR}, pd.column38=#{column38:VARCHAR}, pd.column39=#{column39:VARCHAR}, pd.column40=#{column40:VARCHAR}, pd.column41=#{column41:VARCHAR}, pd.column42=#{column42:VARCHAR}, pd.column43=#{column43:VARCHAR}, pd.column44=#{column44:VARCHAR}, pd.column45=#{column45:VARCHAR}, pd.column46=#{column46:VARCHAR}, pd.column47=#{column47:VARCHAR}, pd.column48=#{column48:VARCHAR}, pd.column49=#{column49:VARCHAR}, pd.column50=#{column50:VARCHAR} WHERE pd.id=#{id:NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM WL_FORM t WHERE t.id = #{id:NUMERIC}
